verses.text: The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* when no man \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w*: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* are \w bold|strong="H0982"\w* as a \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*.

For the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \add are\add* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof: but by a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \add and\add* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* the \w state|strong="H3651"\w* \add thereof\add* shall be \w prolonged|strong="H0748"\w*.\f + \fr 28.2 \ft by…: or, by men of understanding and wisdom shall they likewise be prolonged\f*

A \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that \w oppresseth|strong="H6231"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \add is like\add* a \w sweeping|strong="H5502"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* which leaveth no \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.\f + \fr 28.3 \ft which…: Heb. without food\f*

They that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*: but such as \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w contend|strong="H1624"\w* with them.

\w Evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* not \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: but they that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* all \add things\add*.

\w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w uprightness|strong="H8537"\w*, than \add he that is\add* \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w* \add in his\add* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, though he \add be\add* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*.

Whoso \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add is\add* a \w wise|strong="H0995"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: but he that is a \w companion|strong="H7462"\w* of \w riotous|strong="H2151"\w* \add men\add* \w shameth|strong="H3637"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 28.7 \ft is a companion…: or, feedeth gluttons\f*

He that by \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* and unjust \w gain|strong="H8636"\w* \w increaseth|strong="H7235"\w* his \w substance|strong="H1952"\w*, he shall \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* it for him that will \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*.\f + \fr 28.8 \ft unjust…: Heb. by increase\f*

He that turneth \w away|strong="H5493"\w* his \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* from \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, even his \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \add shall be\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.

Whoso causeth the \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* to go \w astray|strong="H7686"\w* in an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, he shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* himself into his own \w pit|strong="H7816"\w*: but the \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* shall have \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add things\add* in \w possession|strong="H5157"\w*.

The \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* in his own \w conceit|strong="H5869"\w*; but the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* that hath \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* searcheth him \w out|strong="H2713"\w*.\f + \fr 28.11 \ft own…: Heb. eyes\f*

When \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add men\add* do \w rejoice|strong="H5970"\w*, \add there is\add* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*: but when the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* is \w hidden|strong="H2664"\w*.\f + \fr 28.12 \ft hidden: or, sought for\f*

He that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* his \w sins|strong="H6588"\w* shall not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: but whoso \w confesseth|strong="H3034"\w* and \w forsaketh|strong="H5800"\w* \add them\add* shall have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w feareth|strong="H6342"\w* \w alway|strong="H8548"\w*: but he that \w hardeneth|strong="H7185"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* into \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*.

\add As\add* a \w roaring|strong="H5098"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, and a \w ranging|strong="H8264"\w* \w bear|strong="H1677"\w*; \add so is\add* a \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* over the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

The \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* that \w wanteth|strong="H2638"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* \add is\add* also a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w oppressor|strong="H4642"\w*: \add but\add* he that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w* shall \w prolong|strong="H0748"\w* \add his\add* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

A \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that doeth \w violence|strong="H6231"\w* to the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \add any\add* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*; let no man \w stay|strong="H8551"\w* him.

Whoso \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H8549"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*: but \add he that is\add* \w perverse|strong="H6140"\w* \add in his\add* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* at \w once|strong="H0259"\w*.

He that \w tilleth|strong="H5647"\w* his \w land|strong="H0127"\w* shall have \w plenty|strong="H7646"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: but he that \w followeth|strong="H7291"\w* after \w vain|strong="H7386"\w* \add persons\add* shall have poverty \w enough|strong="H7389"\w*.

A \w faithful|strong="H0530"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w abound|strong="H7227"\w* with \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w*: but he that maketh \w haste|strong="H0213"\w* to be \w rich|strong="H6238"\w* shall not be \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w*.\f + \fr 28.20 \ft innocent: or, unpunished\f*

To have \w respect|strong="H5234"\w* of \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: for for a \w piece|strong="H6595"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \add that\add* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* will \w transgress|strong="H6586"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0376"\w* that \w hasteth|strong="H0926"\w* to be \w rich|strong="H1952"\w* \add hath\add* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w considereth|strong="H3045"\w* not that \w poverty|strong="H2639"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon him.\f + \fr 28.22 \ft hasteth…: or, hath and evil eye hasteth to be rich\f*

He that \w rebuketh|strong="H3198"\w* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* more \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* than he that \w flattereth|strong="H2505"\w* with the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

Whoso \w robbeth|strong="H1497"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* no \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*; the same \add is\add* the \w companion|strong="H2270"\w* of a \w destroyer|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 28.24 \ft a destroyer: Heb. a man destroying\f*

He that is of a \w proud|strong="H7342"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* stirreth \w up|strong="H1624"\w* \w strife|strong="H4066"\w*: but he that putteth his \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be made \w fat|strong="H1878"\w*.

He that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in his own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*: but whoso \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w wisely|strong="H2451"\w*, he shall be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*.

He that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* shall not \w lack|strong="H4270"\w*: but he that \w hideth|strong="H5956"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall have \w many|strong="H7227"\w* a \w curse|strong="H3994"\w*.

When the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* themselves: but when they \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*.
